title: Incentive Award
subtitle: Artistic gymnastics for gymnasts looking for more.

classes.detail: Junior class for levels 1 - 3. Fees may include Gymnastics NZ's recreational member fee of $9.77, and HCG's annual membership fee of $10

body:
The Incentive Award programme is designed Gymnastics New Zealand, and offers awards in 4 different codes; Artistic, Trampoline, Rhythmic, and Aerobics. Harbour City GymSports currently offers Artistic Incentive Awards for levels 1 – 7.

Gymnasts work in small focused groups towards achieving skills and routines required by their level. Gymnasts 6 years and over gain entry to these classes by coach selection, and have generally participated in our Ribbon or Badge award programmes.

## Assessment

Awards are gained through a testing process where gymnasts are examined by qualified GNZ judges. Classes will be offered testing twice yearly within the Club. Testing is carried out either on a special testing day, or during normal class time. Preparation for testing involves:

* Conditioning – Development of strength, agility and flexibility
* Skills – A cross section of skills on all apparatus
* Routines – Skills sequences performed on various apparatus

## Competitions

Incentive class gymnasts have the opportunity to enter “Gym for All” competitions. GFA competitions are held across the region and we actively encourage Incentive class participants to enter.
